definition: to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish

sentences.english: Immediately, for no reason, she has complete power of a man who's throwing himself at her.
sentences.chinese: 很快，她就会对这种投怀送抱的男人失去兴趣。

sentences.english: Once your business hits the big time, you'll have hordes of women throwing themselves at you.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你事业成功，你就会有很多女人向你投怀送抱。

sentences.english: But when I was hurling my body onto yours , you did not seem to want to make it happen .
sentences.chinese: 但当我对你投怀送抱的时候，你似乎并不想让它发生。

sentences.english: I saw a girl throw herself on him.
sentences.chinese: 我看到有一个女孩对他投怀送抱。

sentences.english: I saw a girl throw herself on you.
sentences.chinese: 我看到有一个女孩对你投怀送抱。

sentences.english: MM: I saw a girl throw herself on you. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看到有一个女孩对你投怀送抱。她是谁？

definition: to proposition a woman
to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc)/to fawn upon (an influential politician etc)/to court sb's favor/to ingratiate oneself
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
to seduce/to tempt
half willing and half unwilling (idiom); to yield after making a show of resistance
to throw amorous or flirtatious glances at sb (esp. of a woman)
to cast flirtatious glances at sb (idiom)
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
charm/loveliness (of a woman)
rarity/rare object/rare person/extraordinarily beautiful woman
to get close to/to get on intimate terms with
to provoke/to entice/to lure/to tantalize/to tease/to titillate
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
to take advantage of sb/to freeload
slut/floozy/prostitute
to be moved/to be tempted
